articles.title: Tips to support your child's mental health - Times of India
articles.description: Data suggests that about 1 in every 5 children experience a mental health issue.
articles.content: Most mental issues are due to unhealthy lifestyle habits. Healthy diet, sound sleep, and daily exercises will keep their mind and body in shape.
